item.title: Applications closing for the Airtable AI Incubator
item.description: ðŸš€ Applications are now open for the Airtable AI Incubator! This program offers builders a chance to transform their ideas into practical solutions with structured mentorship and support. Interested participants must submit their applications by 12pm ET on September 30. Answer key questions to clarify your vision and readiness. Don’t miss this opportunity to innovate! #AirtableAI #AIIncubator #Innovation #TechForGood #ApplyNow
